backend.src.app.repositories.equipments package

Submodules

backend.src.app.repositories.equipments.equipment_repository module

class backend.src.app.repositories.equipments.equipment_repository.EquipmentRepository(equipment_inventory_number)[source]

Bases: object

The EquipmentRepository class encapsulates the logic necessary to access the database and perform CRUD operations on the Equipment model.

Variables:

  • equipment_inventory_number – Unique inventory number of the equipment.

  • equipment – Instance of Equipment model.

damaged()[source]

Set the status of the equipment to “Damaged”.

delete()[source]

Delete the current equipment instance from the database.

get_equipment()[source]

Retrieve the current equipment instance.

Returns:

Returns the current equipment instance or None if it doesn’t exist.

Return type:

Equipment or None

get_equipment_all_data()[source]

Retrieve all data of the current equipment instance.

Returns:

Returns a dictionary containing all data of the current equipment instance. Contains following keys: - inventory_number (int): The equipment’s unique inventory number. - category (str): The category of the equipment. - manufacturer (str): The manufacturer of the equipment. - model (str): The model of the equipment. - size (str): The size of the equipment. - price_per_hour (float): The rental price per hour for the equipment. - description (str): The description of the equipment. - registration_date (datetime.date): The equipment’s registration date. - status (str): The current status of the equipment (“Free”, “Rented”, or “Damaged”).

Return type:

dict[str, any]

rent(new_rental_id)[source]

Set the current rental ID of the equipment and update its status to “Rented”.

Parameters:

new_rental_id (int) – ID of the current rental.

save()[source]

Save the current equipment instance to the database. The equipment status is set to “Free” and the registration_date is set to the current date.

unrent()[source]

Clear the current rental ID of the equipment and update its status to “Free”.

update(update_data)[source]

Update the current equipment instance based on the provided update data.

Parameters:

update_data (dict[str, any]) – Dictionary containing new values for the equipment’s attributes.

Returns:

Returns True if the update was successful, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

backend.src.app.repositories.equipments.equipments_repository module

class backend.src.app.repositories.equipments.equipments_repository.EquipmentsRepository(create_data=None)[source]

Bases: object

The EquipmentsRepository class provides methods for creating, retrieving, and sorting Equipment objects.

This class acts as a repository and uses the Equipment model to perform operations related to equipment.

create()[source]

Creates an Equipment instance.

This method takes in a dictionary containing information about an equipment, validates this data, and if valid, creates an Equipment instance.

Returns:

If the equipment was created.

Return type:

bool

get_all()[source]

Retrieves all Equipment instances.

Returns:

A list of all Equipment instances.

Return type:

list[Equipment]

sort_all(sort_data)[source]

Sorts all Equipment instances based on the provided sorting parameters.

Parameters:

sort_data (dict[str, any]) – Dictionary containing the sorting parameters.

Returns:

A sorted list of all Equipment instances if the sorting parameters are valid, None otherwise.

Return type:

list[Equipment] or None
